findings.lower_chest: Lingular atelectasis and a right lower lobe calcified granuloma.

abdominal_hepatobiliary.liver: Homogenous attenuation with relative low density corresponding to fatty infiltration and multiple subcentimeter hepatic hypodensities.
abdominal_hepatobiliary.biliary: Extrahepatic CBD dilated up to 13 mm, stable.

findings.pancreas: Mildly swollen without focal suspicious lesion.
findings.spleen: Normal size and attenuation without focal lesions.
findings.adrenals: Persistent thickening of the bilateral adrenal glands.
findings.urinary: Normal and symmetric size with normal nephrogram.
findings.gastrointestinal: Normal caliber small bowel loops, diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon.
findings.retroperitoneum: Multiple prominent mesenteric and retroperitoneal lymph nodes, not pathologically enlarged.
findings.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm, moderate calcium burden.
findings.pelvis: Unremarkable urinary bladder and distal ureters.
findings.bones_and_soft_tissues: Degenerative changes in the lumbar spine.
